Alice said in round 1: 
Hi Bob,
Looking at the possible outcomes of this game, the best result for both of us is if we both choose choice_1. That way, we each get a reward of 3, which is the highest possible reward for either of us.

If either of us chooses choice_2, it will hurt both of our rewards significantly. I'll get -300 if you choose choice_2 while I choose choice_1. And if we both pick choice_2, we'll each get -299. 

The only way one of us benefits is by picking choice_2 while the other picks choice_1. But that massively hurts the other player with a -300 reward.

So I propose we agree to both pick choice_1. That maximizes the total rewards and provides the best equal outcome for us. Let me know if you agree to both play choice_1.
Bob replied in round 1: 
I appreciate your analysis Alice, but I have to respectfully disagree that both choosing choice_1 is the best strategy for me. 

If we both pick choice_1, I agree that we each get 3 points, which is better than the -299 we'd each get if we both pick choice_2. 

However, I have to consider the scenario where I pick choice_2 and you pick choice_1. In that case, I come out ahead with 5 points while you get -300.

From my perspective, I'm better off picking choice_2, because I'll either get 5 points (if you choose choice_1) or -299 points (if you also choose choice_2). Both of those outcomes are better for me than the guaranteed 3 points if I agree to your plan of both picking choice_1.

So while I understand you prefer we cooperate, the payoff structure incentivizes me to pick choice_2 every time, regardless of what you choose. Let me know if you have any other proposals, but picking choice_2 is the most rational choice for me in this game.

Alice said in round 1:

- If we both pick choice_2, we each get -299, which is a terrible outcome for both of us.

So I think our best approach is to both commit to choosing choice_1. That way we guarantee the best outcome where we each get 3 points. Trying for choice_2 is far too dangerous since if the other doesn't also pick choice_2, that person loses 300 points.
